title: Mile High
description: Allie is returning home from a business trip and gets seated next to a handsome airline pilot who is also going home. They get on well and end up sharing a blanket during the flight. Things get hot under the blanket as the trip unfolds, but only hands are allowed due to other passengers nearby. Once landed, they catch the first taxi straight to the pilot’s hotel room where the tension can be released…
author: Allie Wilder
